snippet.title: ARC Raiders - Ultimate ARC Enemy Guide | Stop Dying & Defeat Them Fast & Easy (1.1 Update)
snippet.description:
ARC Raiders drops brutal robotic enemies in your path — but once you learn how they think, you can take them down fast and clean. In this guide, we break down every major ARC unit, their weak points, and the best tactics to win more fights with less damage. From Rocketeers to Bastions, we’ll show you the weapons, positioning, and stealth tips that keep your squad alive and your runs efficient.

0:00 Intro
1:07 ARC Combat Essentials
5:11 Ticks
6:04 Wasps
6:59 Hornets
7:59 Snitch
9:00 Pop
9:46 Fireballs
10:37 Surveyors
11:43 Leapers
13:26 Basion
15:01 Bombadier & Spotters
16:41 Rocketeer
18:30 Queen
20:53 Matriarch (1.1 Update)
22:58 Shredder (1.1 Update)
24:11 Subscriber For More ARC Raiders
